A functional syllable-based neuroprosthesis

Sep 12, 2025

This post is a wrapper for a report (written in typst!!!) about an extension of the work I did during my internship at Institut de l’Audition. Since speech reconstruction is the central theme of this work, I have included some audios at the end of this post.

Report

Results: audio reconstruction from neural features

To demonstrate that the approach is indeed viable, here are some examples of unseen audio from the validation set. Please keep in mind that:

  • This is a work in progress, I have not yet refined model architecture and optimized hyperparameters.
  • This is not the best performing example of the validation set. Examples that are phonetically closer to training data enjoy a near-perfect reconstruction for all layers.

Target sentence: “A lot of people complain”
